certificate.description: PEM-encoded certificate for the Certificate Authority.

certificateChain.description: PEM-encoded certificate chain that includes any intermediate certificates and chains up to root CA. Required for subordinate Certificate Authorities. Not allowed for root Certificate Authorities.
